message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. I'm offering it at $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I really think it's a great product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $12,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints. However,  $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I could come down to $18,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $18,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you meet me in the middle?
